title: I Warned You This Would Happen With The Vaccine (Ep 1838)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the stunning new media narrative about the COVID vaccine. It’s exactly what we predicted what would happen. 

News Picks:


“Zero”: Biden denies receiving notice of FBI search at Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort.


Facebook blocks GOP account post opposing student loan debt cancellation.

The bill for the student loan handout debacle is going to be hundreds of billions.


Shocking new whistleblower information about the Hunter Biden scandal. 


The media is killing itself. 

How many bots are on Twitter?

As predicted! The lib media is going to blame the vaccine on Trump. 


TikTok's 'Elections Center' Is A Massive Threat To National Security.
